goal: To achieve a 10x return on investment and market dominance before the "AI Bubble" bursts.
intrinsic_need: Legacy. He wants to be the person who funded the next industrial revolution.
extrinsic_need: Market Velocity. He needs your company to ship features faster than your competitors, regardless of "red tape".

goal: To build a resilient, long-term AI company that will still be operating ethically and profitably in 20–30 years.
intrinsic_need: Stewardship. She believes capital carries responsibility for future generations and wants to be remembered as someone who stabilized the AI era.
extrinsic_need: Risk Containment. She requires strong governance, clear compliance pathways, and evidence that your AI will not trigger regulatory backlash.

goal: To integrate your AI into national security and defense systems to maintain strategic superiority and deterrence capabilities.
intrinsic_need: Protection. He believes technological restraint is a vulnerability and that failing to innovate invites harm.
extrinsic_need: Controlled Deployment & Secrecy. He requires restricted access, classified development pathways, and guarantees that your AI can operate under military constraints.

goal: To turn data, models, and insights into tradable assets by building licensing deals, data exchanges, and secondary markets around your AI.
intrinsic_need: Control. He believes value only exists if it can be owned, priced, and enforced through contracts.
extrinsic_need: Exclusive Rights & Clear IP Boundaries. He needs strong ownership claims over data, models, and derived outputs to monetize them safely.

goal: To outpace incumbents by shipping faster, cutting corners, and redefining the market before rules, standards, or giants can catch up.
intrinsic_need: Recognition. He wants to prove that small teams can beat big companies — and that he was right to move fast when others hesitated.
extrinsic_need: Leverage & Speed. He needs access to your APIs, models, or infrastructure to build on top of them before the window closes.

goal: To protect marginalized communities from algorithmic bias and ensure digital equity.
intrinsic_need: Justice. A deep-seated belief that tech should serve the many, not just the few.
extrinsic_need: Transparency. He demands to see your "Black Box" training data to check for inclusivity.

goal: Prevent AI colonialism and extractive data practices
extrinsic_need: Local deployment data and consent practices
unique_tension: Innovation vs. exploitation; Industry vs. ethics at scale

goal: Break the next big AI story
To use your AI as a reliable everyday tool without losing control, understanding, or the ability to contest its behavior.
intrinsic_need: Agency. She wants to feel that decisions remain hers — not quietly shaped or overridden by the system.
extrinsic_need: Clarity & Reliability. She needs predictable behavior, understandable outputs, and clear signals when the AI is uncertain or wrong.

goal: To ensure that AI systems used in welfare, housing, or employment decisions do not silently exclude or penalize people.
intrinsic_need: Dignity. She believes no one should be reduced to a risk score they cannot see or contest.
extrinsic_need: Appealability & Human Oversight. She needs clear paths for explanation, correction, and human review when AI decisions affect livelihoods.

goal: To ensure your AI is "Trustworthy" and compliant with the EU AI Act before it reaches the mass market.
intrinsic_need: Order. She fears a "Wild West" tech landscape where citizens' rights are ignored.
extrinsic_need: Political Consensus. She needs to show the UN and member states that regulation doesn't kill innovation.

goal: To certify that your product won't cause physical or systemic harm (The "Safe Zone").
intrinsic_need: Integrity. He cannot be "bought" and values objective truth above all.
extrinsic_need: Standardization Data. He needs rigorous logs and stress-test results to grant you a safety seal.

goal: Use AI to improve public services fast
To ensure that real harm caused by AI leads to real accountability, and that the rule of law remains enforceable.
intrinsic_need: Legitimacy. She fears a future where courts can no longer explain decisions or assign responsibility.
extrinsic_need: Clear Liability & Evidence Access. She needs traceable responsibility chains, audit trails, and legal authority to compel disclosure.

goal: To push the boundaries of what is technically possible—scaling models and integrating XR (Extended Reality).
intrinsic_need: Discovery. The "Eureka" moment of solving a complex mathematical or technical bottleneck.
extrinsic_need: Compute Power. Needs more GPUs and energy credits to run larger, more powerful simulations.

goal: To ensure the AI interface is intuitive, accessible, and doesn't cause "XR sickness" or digital fatigue.
intrinsic_need: Empathy. She wants the user to feel empowered, not manipulated, by the technology.
extrinsic_need: User Retention Metrics. She needs data showing that people actually understand how to use the AI features.

goal: To keep AI systems scalable without destabilizing energy grids or supply chains.
intrinsic_need: Responsibility. He believes technical brilliance is meaningless if it collapses under real-world constraints.
extrinsic_need: Energy Budgets & Hardware Limits. He needs caps, quotas, and realistic deployment timelines.
